item.title: Java error compiling. coding lines inlcuded
item.dc:creator: @parke5 parke5
item.description:
@parke5 wrote:

[code]public class UserInput
{
public static void main (String[] args)
{
int intInput;
String stringInput;

	Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);

	System.out.print("What is your name? ");
	stringInput = input.nextLine();

	System.out.print("What is your age? ");
	intInput = input.nextInt();

	input.close();

	System.out.print("Hello " + stringInput +
	                    ". You are " + intInput + " years old!");
					}
			}[/code]

that is my code. here is my compiling error [code]C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Owner\My Documents\UserInput.java:8: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Scanner
location: class UserInput
Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
^
C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Owner\My Documents\UserInput.java:8: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Scanner
location: class UserInput
Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
^
2 errors

Tool completed with exit code 1[/code] If its any help im using textpad.
